channel.title: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?"

item.title: Re: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
item.content:encoded: I tend to switch over to Billy for the prize wheel, and switch over to my mission team for everything else. It works out well for now, and since I keep a buffer of ryo, I can just switch to Billy (and team) at the end of one day and do the prize wheel, then back at the start of the next, after doing the wheel again. With an effectively free Billy, why not?

item.title: Re: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
item.content:encoded: forgot to login the poster above is me.

item.title: Re: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
item.content:encoded:
With billy in my party I've won several permanent items, 3 notes, 2 K-Dog's Headband and Yuri.

Worth it ;)

item.title: Re: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
Re: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
item.content:encoded: Emosuke Lvl. 2 drops Razorblades, and they're on his page :)

item.title: Re: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
item.content:encoded: He drops razorblades? That's not listed on his char thing :P might be update time hehe.

item.title: Re: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
item.content:encoded:
My Emosuke and Billy are both Lvl. 1 right now. I'm kind of hoping to get them to level 3, so that requires getting Billy through his level up missions, getting Billy to drop a Billy Bucket, and getting Emosuke to drop 3 razor blades (in addition to the 8 CDs I still need). So, we need to spend some quality time together.

But, I may have lied. I may setup a bingo'ing party and try and get the Trade Lvl. 2, and otherwise become preoccupied with nuking enemies of the Wiki Village ;)

item.title: Re: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
Re: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
item.content:encoded:
I've spent over 100,000 ryo on the prize wheel (enough to get The Rack just from losing, and more!) and I've never won a super rare. But I also almost never have Billy in my party either, which may explain part of the reason why I have such bad luck!

I think he'd be worth it, and wish I had used him more. However, I kept having higher priorities. After I finish this double potion mission, I'm intending on having Billy in my party pretty much permanently (same with Emosuke).

item.title: Billy worth it if you mess with prize wheel a lot?
item.content:encoded: Is the 5% that reliable? I don't use billy on my team since I'm collecting burgers (may wait on this since i have my 12 chips), and emo pics (may wait on the cd's for now since its b rank). I may use him again since I basicaly live in the prize wheel (i go up to 6-7 tries normally…more if i have a lot extra but its not really worth it normally »)
